verses.verse: Then they told <WH5046> David, <WH1732> saying, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> the Philistines <WH6430> fight <WH3898> against Keilah, <WH7084> and they rob <WH8154> the threshing floors. <WH1637>

Therefore David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of the LORD, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> Shall I go <WH3212> and smite <WH5221> these <WH428> Philistines? <WH6430> And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to David, <WH1732> Go, <WH3212> and smite <WH5221> the Philistines, <WH6430> and save <WH3467> Keilah. <WH7084>

And David's <WH1732> men <WH582> said <WH559> to him, Behold, <WH2009> we be afraid <WH3373> here <WH6311> in Judah: <WH3063> how <WH637> much <WH637> more then <WH3588> if <WH3588> we come <WH3212> to Keilah <WH7084> against <WH413> the armies <WH4634> of the Philistines? <WH6430>

Then David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of the LORD <WH3068> yet <WH5750> again. <WH3254> And the LORD <WH3068> answered <WH6030> him and said, <WH559> Arise, <WH6965> go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Keilah; <WH7084> for I will deliver <WH5414> the Philistines <WH6430> into your hand. <WH3027>

So David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> went <WH3212> to Keilah, <WH7084> and fought <WH3898> with the Philistines, <WH6430> and brought <WH5090> away their cattle, <WH4735> and smote <WH5221> them with a great <WH1419> slaughter. <WH4347> So David <WH1732> saved <WH3467> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Keilah. <WH7084>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when Abiathar <WH54> the son <WH1121> of Ahimelech <WH288> fled <WH1272> to David <WH1732> to Keilah, <WH7084> that he came <WH3381> down <WH3381> with an ephod <WH646> in his hand. <WH3027>

And it was told <WH5046> Saul <WH7586> that David <WH1732> was come <WH935> to Keilah. <WH7084> And Saul <WH7586> said, <WH559> God <WH430> has delivered <WH5234> him into my hand; <WH3027> for he is shut <WH5462> in, by entering <WH935> into a town <WH5892> that has gates <WH1817> and bars. <WH1280>

And Saul <WH7586> called <WH8085> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> together <WH3162> to war, <WH4421> to go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Keilah, <WH7084> to besiege <WH6696> David <WH1732> and his men. <WH582>

And David <WH1732> knew <WH3045> that Saul <WH7586> secretly <WH2790> practiced <WH2790> mischief <WH7451> against <WH5921> him; and he said <WH559> to Abiathar <WH54> the priest, <WH3548> Bring <WH5066> here <WH5066> the ephod. <WH646>

Then said <WH559> David, <WH1732> O LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> your servant <WH5650> has certainly heard <WH8085> that Saul <WH7586> seeks <WH1245> to come <WH935> to Keilah, <WH7084> to destroy <WH7843> the city <WH5892> for my sake. <WH5668>

Will the men <WH1167> of Keilah <WH7084> deliver <WH5462> me up into his hand? <WH3027> will Saul <WH7586> come <WH3381> down, <WH3381> as your servant <WH5650> has heard? <WH8085> O LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> I beseech <WH4994> you, tell <WH5046> your servant. <WH5650> And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> He will come <WH3381> down. <WH3381>

Then said <WH559> David, <WH1732> Will the men <WH1167> of Keilah <WH7084> deliver <WH5462> me and my men <WH582> into the hand <WH3027> of Saul? <WH7586> And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> They will deliver <WH5462> you up.

Then David <WH1732> and his men, <WH582> which were about six <WH8337> hundred, <WH3967> arose <WH6965> and departed <WH3318> out of Keilah, <WH7084> and went <WH1980> wherever <WH834> they could go. <WH1980> And it was told <WH5046> Saul <WH7586> that David <WH1732> was escaped <WH4422> from Keilah; <WH7084> and he declined <WH2308> to go <WH3318> forth. <WH3318>

And David <WH1732> stayed <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> in strong <WH4679> holds, <WH4679> and remained <WH3427> in a mountain <WH2022> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Ziph. <WH2128> And Saul <WH7586> sought <WH1245> him every <WH3605> day, <WH3117> but God <WH430> delivered <WH5414> him not into his hand. <WH3027>
And David <WH1732> saw <WH7200> that Saul <WH7586> was come <WH3318> out to seek <WH1245> his life: <WH5315> and David <WH1732> was in the wilderness <WH4057> of Ziph <WH2128> in a wood. <WH2793>
And Jonathan <WH3083> Saul's <WH7586> son <WH1121> arose, <WH6965> and went <WH3212> to David <WH1732> into the wood, <WH2793> and strengthened <WH2388> his hand <WH3027> in God. <WH430>

And he said <WH559> to him, Fear <WH3372> not: for the hand <WH3027> of Saul <WH7586> my father <WH1> shall not find <WH4672> you; and you shall be king <WH4427> over <WH5921> Israel, <WH3478> and I shall be next <WH4932> to you; and that also <WH1571> Saul <WH7586> my father <WH1> knows. <WH3045>

And they two <WH8147> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> and David <WH1732> stayed <WH3427> in the wood, <WH2793> and Jonathan <WH3083> went <WH1980> to his house. <WH1004>

Then came <WH5927> up the Ziphites <WH2130> to Saul <WH7586> to Gibeah, <WH1390> saying, <WH559> Does not David <WH1732> hide <WH5641> himself with us in strong <WH4679> holds <WH4679> in the wood, <WH2793> in the hill <WH1389> of Hachilah, <WH2444> which <WH834> is on the south <WH3225> of Jeshimon? <WH3452>

Now <WH6258> therefore, O king, <WH4428> come <WH3381> down <WH3381> according to all <WH3605> the desire <WH183> of your soul <WH5315> to come <WH3381> down; <WH3381> and our part shall be to deliver <WH5462> him into the king's <WH4428> hand. <WH3027>
And Saul <WH7586> said, <WH559> Blessed <WH1288> be you of the LORD; <WH3068> for you have compassion <WH2550> on me.

Go, <WH3212> I pray <WH4994> you, prepare <WH3559> yet, and know <WH3045> and see <WH7200> his place <WH4725> where <WH834> his haunt <WH7272> is, and who <WH4310> has seen <WH7200> him there: <WH8033> for it is told <WH559> me that he deals very subtly. <WH6191>

See <WH7200> therefore, and take knowledge <WH3045> of all <WH3605> the lurking <WH4224> places where <WH834> <WH8033> he hides <WH2244> himself, and come <WH7725> you again <WH7725> to me with the certainty, <WH3559> and I will go <WH1980> with you: and it shall come <WH1961> to pass, if <WH518> he be in the land, <WH776> that I will search <WH2664> him out throughout all <WH3605> the thousands <WH505> of Judah. <WH3063>

And they arose, <WH6965> and went <WH3212> to Ziph <WH2128> before <WH6440> Saul: <WH7586> but David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> were in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon, <WH4584> in the plain <WH6160> on <WH413> the south <WH3225> of Jeshimon. <WH3452>

Saul <WH7586> also and his men <WH582> went <WH3212> to seek <WH1245> him. And they told <WH5046> David; <WH1732> why he came <WH3381> down <WH3381> into a rock, <WH5553> and stayed <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon. <WH4584> And when Saul <WH7586> heard <WH8085> that, he pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> David <WH1732> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon. <WH4584>

And Saul <WH7586> went <WH3212> on this <WH2088> side <WH6654> of the mountain, <WH2022> and David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> on that side <WH6654> of the mountain: <WH2022> and David <WH1732> made haste <WH2648> to get <WH3212> away <WH3212> for fear <WH6440> of Saul; <WH7586> for Saul <WH7586> and his men <WH582> compassed <WH5849> David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> round about to take <WH8610> them.
But there came <WH935> a messenger <WH4397> to Saul, <WH7586> saying, <WH559> Haste <WH4116> you, and come; <WH3212> for the Philistines <WH6430> have invaded <WH6584> the land. <WH776>

Why Saul <WH7586> returned <WH7725> from pursuing <WH7291> after <WH310> David, <WH1732> and went <WH3212> against <WH7125> the Philistines: <WH6430> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they called that place <WH4725> Selahammahlekoth. <WH5555>
And David <WH1732> went <WH5927> up from there, <WH8033> and dwelled <WH3427> in strong <WH4679> holds <WH4679> at <WH413> Engedi. <WH5872>
